1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: The Secret Mediterranean with Trevor McDonald (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: New series. Trevor McDonald embarks on an amazing journey across the Mediterranean and uncovers some incredible stories. In this episode, he visits Izmir in Turkey and Venice.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: The Secret Mediterranean with Trevor McDonald (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Trevor McDonald visits the Greek island of Santorini, meets movie mogul Tarak Ben Ammar in Tunisia and goes to the HQ of the French Foreign Legion.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: The Secret Mediterranean with Trevor McDonald (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Trevor McDonald's Mediterranean journey continues. In this episode, he visits Italy, Spain and Morocco, taking in Vesuvius and a hair-raising ride in a Spanish supercar.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: The Secret Mediterranean with Trevor McDonald (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Trevor McDonald begins the final leg of his journey across the Mediterranean with a visit to Egypt. Then he heads to Cyprus and Malta.

imdb.plot outline: Join popular presenter Sir Trevor McDonald as he explores the beautiful islands of the Caribbean. From the coffee plantations to the crystal blue seas, there are stunning landscapes, exotic creatures and outlandish cultural events aplenty. Meeting the rich and powerful, eccentric locals and even royalty as he goes, Sir Trevor provides a unique insight into Caribbean life.
imdb.title: The Secret Mediterranean with Trevor McDonald
plot: Spanning three continents and 21 countries, the Mediterranean has nurtured some of the most dazzling civilizations of antiquity. Today, amid the stunning landscapes, more cultures live side by side here than anywhere else on earth.

Join popular presenter Sir Trevor McDonald as he explores the beautiful islands of the Caribbean. From the coffee plantations to the crystal blue seas, there are stunning landscapes, exotic creatures and outlandish cultural events aplenty. Meeting the rich and powerful, eccentric locals and even royalty as he goes, Sir Trevor provides a unique insight into Caribbean life.
